reviews.review_msg: She was great - grading was very tough, but very fair. Will make you work hard for your grade. Thinking for yourself is mandatory in her classes and papers. Knowledgeable about the subject. Will give extensions if you ask nicely.

I have never had a teacher so arrogant before, with such obvious and utter disregard for her students. It is evident that she doesn't love teaching but rather is using it as a means to do research. The least she could do is try to hide it.
I thought lectures were very clear, despite voice and sometimes patrionizing manner - grading was awful.  We can't all be as perfect as she is...
